title: Strengthening Management Strategy Practical Competencies: Constructivist-Based Elementary Social Studies Innovation Teaching Method Design Course

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: A primary social studies curriculum innovation project based on constructivist learning theory is designed and an implementation plan is established.
Three or more learner-participatory activities (discussions, collaborative learning, reflective inquiry) can be developed in online environments.
Instructional design proposals are revised and supplemented at least twice through peer evaluation and feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
